title: Chat banned for joking with a friend
body: I am sick and tired of the league community at the moment. I just got chat restricted 10 games... For talking crap to my duo queue buddy who laughed it off. He didn't even report me, other people did. When did people turn this game into a giant wimp fest? Why would it be anyone's business but our own if we flame each other jokingly? Sorry, but I fail to see how I'm a menace to society as I type "git rekt noob" to the guy sitting 5 feet away from me, while the trolls and flamers and legitimately game ruining people continue to run rampant. Fix your system Riot. Your turning your community into a toxic cesspool where you can't go a single game without everyone reporting one another.

2. If it looks like I'm stealing something, I shouldn't be surprised that people think I'm stealing. If it looks like you're trash talking someone, you should expect people to assume you're trash talking someone.
3. Regardless of who you  were talking to, some people in your game decided what you had said was unacceptable. It  is their right to think so, and their right to report it. You should take this as a message that "while I think this is ok, it bothers people and I should stop out of respect for other humans"
4. It's not like it takes only 1 infraction to receive punishment. If you reached the point where disciplinary measures had to be taken, that means you've been getting reported in MANY other games.

Many times I've reported people for trash talking another person on my team even though nothing was said to me.  It throws everyone off. > [{quoted}](name=fahersom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vniQbtON,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-06T18:37:35.244+0000)
>
> Why would it be anyone's business but our own if we flame each other jokingly?

You made it their business when you said it in front of them.

For example, if you and your buddy are in a restaurant, and are yelling at/insulting each other, what you are doing is **absolutely** the business of the other diners - for exactly as long and to exactly the extent to which it is disruptive of their experience. Similarly, what you say into team or all chat is absolutely the business of the other people in your team or game (respectively) - for exactly as long as you're sharing the game.

If you want to insult your buddy, feel free to say it out loud. Or use a voice program. Or even use a private message to him through the client (they aren't checked by the system, because they aren't part of the game chat). To put that another way, if you want them to stay out of your business, it would be in your best interest to not shove your business in their face.

Welcome to riots policy on ban first, ask questions later. I almost got banned for doing something similar with a friend of mine who was playing bad. She knew I was joking and the entire team did as well tho. :s It got to the point where the entire team was joking back and forth with each other, which improved our play style due to us not focusing on our mistakes but focusing on the joys of the game.

So a few points to address: firstly, I get it. I made a mistake with the "fail to miss the point". Egg on my face. It was early in the morning, ok?  Secondly, as for the rioter response; BS. I don't randomly call people Salvadorian pricks. I looked at my reform card.  One game was trash talk back and forth between me and the enemy team; if saying "mad cuz bad" sarcastically and telling twitch to stop crying in all is really soooooooo terrible, your priorities are out of sorts. I frequently use my friends name- which, of the three games on my reform card, only one was with him in the room, and it was the one I talked to him the least in. As for skype, he refuses to buy a mic- and call him a Salvadorian prick (ooooooh how sinister), and this shows that we know each other. He doesn't give a damn, so why should anyone else? And one game I was ABSOLUTELY toxic in; i deserve to be punished for that one, as I will begrudgingly admit that I agreed to the Summoner's Code or whatever. However, one game of me demanding someone stop being a twat and afking in base is actually my exact point in this. I'm being punished for doing something that is currently happening in this very thread; trash talk. Its harmless. Im not butthurt because people pointed out flaws in my english, or put smite icons in response to a rioter calling me out. But where is the system here? What if I were one of the people who reported me? This forum is toxic in response to me questioning my own toxicity. People literally frequent this forum just to call people out. The system is twisted, and backwards, and is a good representation that Riot is creating a breed of pussies who will instantly jump to the report button in game and then turn into self-righteous jackasses the second they are elsewhere. "constantly harassing" as people fire back in the forums. GG Riot

OR you're creating a breed of people that think it's alright to use the in game chat to be a grade A troll.  Talk about the game, or shut your trap. I don't care if you're telling rated G jokes all game. If you're spamming the chat i'm using to log people's Flash timers, ult timers, etc. then you're fucking me over.  
especially if you're fucking my timers by calling somebody a Prick. because then it's annoying, childish, and needs  to quit.
